name: Mi Familia
description:
Overview

Play as Abuelita Merci  the oldest person in her family who is slowly feeling the pull away from this world to meet her ancestors, she decides to go through all her treasured memories before she says her final goodbye.

Goals

Go around the house and interact with trinkets around the house to trigger Abuelita's Memories.

Controls 

A and D to move left and right

Q to Interact.

Team Members

Victor - Programmer

Miko - Artist

Abhi - Sound

Abhay -Artist

Joe - Artist

Pari - Artist

Arun - Project Manager
